credit_line: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
title: Shoreline with Many Boats at Sunset
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
description: Water in foreground with shoreline at left extending back towards distant sunset. On and along shoreline, five sailboats. Additional sailboat in midground at right.
name: Sketchbook folio
